Sentiments.Phrase: It was late at night, and I was
in the office finishing up some paperwork for Mr. Davenshire.
I heard some gunshots, so I rushed to the window.
There he was, lifeless at my feet. My

Hints: I need it to seem like she shot Mr. Davenshire.
I can combine phrases to form new sentences...
I need to place her at the scene of the crime.
It should be her gun that killed Mr. Davenshire...
FailureMessages: No, no! I need to try again.
This won't hold up in court!
I need to try again. It's not quite right.
I don't think the jury will buy this...
EmptyFailureMessage: I have to record something. The jury will want to see some evidence...
